item.title: Beta version of PrestaShop 1.6.1.11 - An ASM-focused release
item.description: It has been in the pipeline for a while, it’s now official, PrestaShop 1.6.1.11 will ship soon, most notably with some patches concerning the advanced stock management. Try 1.6.1.11 beta now! In beta at first, it will allow you to judge the stability of this release, and of the important fixes that have been applied to this version. So your feedback is really important to us! Important You should not use this beta version in production.
